## Time in Emergency Department

```{r eval=TRUE, echo=FALSE, fig.height=4.3, fig.width=7, tidy=FALSE}
  
  admColScale <- make_adm_colour_palette()

  ed_los_data_1 <- ed_los_data[ed_los_data$Der_Activity_Month >= window.1.start & ed_los_data$Der_Activity_Month <= window.1.end,]
  
  ed_los_data_2 <- ed_los_data[ed_los_data$Der_Activity_Month >= window.2.start & ed_los_data$Der_Activity_Month <= window.2.end,]

  tryCatch(plot_ed_dist(ed_los_data_1, cumulative = TRUE, prov_codes = pr) + admColScale + labs(subtitle = paste(w1s,w1e,sep=' - ')), error=function(e) NULL)
  
  cat("  \n")
  
  tryCatch(plot_ed_dist(ed_los_data_2, cumulative = TRUE, prov_codes = pr) + admColScale + labs(subtitle = paste(w2s,w2e,sep=' - ')), error=function(e) NULL)
```
